description: This file defines an Angular service class 'AdminService' that provides various administrative operations such as fetching overview metrics, listing users, managing approvals, and updating platform settings. It interacts with API endpoints via the injected BaseApiService, and includes mock data fallback implementations.

classes.name: AdminService
classes.description: Angular injectable service providing admin-only backend operations with fallback mock data.

methods.name: overview
methods.description: Fetches overview metrics for admin dashboard such as user count, pending analysts, folios, and optional revenue.

methods.name: listUsers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of users with basic details, with mock data support.

methods.name: approvals
methods.description: Provides a list of pending analyst applications for approval, optionally mocked.

methods.name: approve
methods.description: Approves a specific analyst application by ID.

methods.name: reject
methods.description: Rejects a specific analyst application by ID, with optional rejection reason.

methods.name: foliosRegistry
methods.description: Lists all folios across platform, with mock data support.

methods.name: updateSettings
methods.description: Updates platform settings with key-value pairs.
